verses.verse: Thus the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> were <S%H3615>completed,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

And by the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3615>completed<s%> His <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H6213>done;<s%> and He <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, <S%H3588>because<s%> in it He <S%H7673>rested<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1254>created<s%> and <S%H6213>made.<s%>

<S%H428>This<s%> is the <S%H8435>account<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

Now <S%H2962>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7880>shrub<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> was <S%H2962>yet<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H2962>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> had <S%H2962>yet<s%> <S%H6779>sprouted,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had not <S%H4305>sent<s%> <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
But a <S%H108>mist<s%> used to <S%H5927>rise<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H6083>dust<s%> from the <S%H127>ground,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathed<s%> into his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H9132>life;<s%> and <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>being.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> the <S%H6924>east,<s%> in <S%H5731>Eden;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> He <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> He had <S%H3335>formed.<s%>

And out of the <S%H127>ground<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> caused to <S%H6779>grow<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> that is <S%H2530>pleasing<s%> to the <S%H4758>sight<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food;<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H9132>life<s%> also in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H9185>good<s%> and <S%H9563>evil.<s%>

Now a <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3318>flowed<s%> out of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H1588>garden;<s%> and from <S%H8033>there<s%> it <S%H6504>divided<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>rivers.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> is <S%H6376>Pishon;<s%> it <S%H5437>flows<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> the <S%H916>bdellium<s%> and the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> are <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H1521>Gihon;<s%> it <S%H5437>flows<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H2313>Tigris;<s%> it <S%H1980>flows<s%> <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is the <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H5117>put<s%> him into the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> it and <S%H8104>keep<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "From <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H398>freely;<s%>

but from the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H9185>good<s%> and <S%H9563>evil<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat,<s%> for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H398>eat<s%> from it you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%> "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> for the <S%H120>man<s%> to be <S%H905>alone;<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> him a <S%H5828>helper<s%> <S%H5048>suitable<s%> for him."

And out of the <S%H127>ground<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> [them] to the <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> he would <S%H7121>call<s%> them; and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature,<s%> that was its <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> but for <S%H121>Adam<s%> there was not <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H5828>helper<s%> <S%H5048>suitable<s%> for him.

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> caused a <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H120>man,<s%> and he <S%H3462>slept;<s%> then He <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H6763>ribs,<s%> and <S%H5462>closed<s%> up the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> at that <S%H8478>place.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1129>fashioned<s%> into a <S%H802>woman<s%> the <S%H6763>rib<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to the <S%H120>man.<s%>

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H6471>now<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> of my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> And <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> She shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H802>Woman,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> she was <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of <S%H376>Man.<s%>"

For <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H5921>cause<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> his father and his <S%H1>mother,<s%> and shall <S%H517>cleave<s%> to his <S%H1692>wife;<s%> and they shall <S%H802>become<s%> <S%H1961>one<s%> <S%H259>flesh.<s%>
And the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> were <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and were not <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
